definition: Ögedei Khan (1186-1242), a son of Genghis Khan
nest/pit or hollow on the human body/lair/den/place/to harbor or shelter/to hold in check/to bend/classifier for litters and broods
Ögedei Khan (1186-1242), a son of Genghis Khan

sentences.english: In April, Ogadai returned northwards leaving Subotai to continue to attack the city.
sentences.chinese: 四月，窩闊臺北還，留速不臺繼續攻城。
